function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Risk tolerance and management not critically performed","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of new safety procedures for pandemic response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in public transportation and construction sites during natural disasters.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on environmental waste and greenhouse gas emissions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of quantitative data on covid-19 impact in the construction industry.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible virus spread among construction workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective health measures for construction workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socioeconomic impacts of the pandemic on the construction industry","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction workers sharing equipment and facilities are susceptible to virus transmission without proper precautions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Services offered by construction workers can act as a potential catalyst for virus transmission, including covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public construction projects are essential for the economy but pose a risk of virus transmission among workers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of construction workers to covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased demand for public transportation impacting construction projects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper information on how to properly wear face masks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk behaviors while wearing masks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cleanliness and sanitization on construction sites","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased medical waste generation during the pandemic, posing a risk to the environment and public health.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of covid-19 among construction workers due to proximity in the work environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced carbon dioxide emissions from automobiles due to remote work and online mode","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial reduction in greenhouse gas emissions and atmospheric constituents","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial decrease in environmental emissions from remote meetings and events","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in black carbon and nitrogen dioxide in the atmosphere, increase in ozone concentration","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Restriction of day-to-day mobility impacting various sectors such as entertainment, tourism, and manufacturing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of innovative technologies like drones and sensors may lead to over-reliance on technology and reduced human oversight, increasing the risk of missing safety hazards.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to clearly define and communicate zones of safety and hazard in the work environment, leading to increased risk of workers entering hazardous areas unintentionally.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic pressures and workload leading to workers being pushed into hazardous work conditions, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited funds availability for transportation distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drastic decline in traffic and personal travel patterns in metropolitan
